Strings.String: Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (x86 and x64) and Update for .NET Framework 4 (KB2468871)
Administrator permissions are required to install .NET Framework 4. Contact your administrator.
Installation of the .NET Framework 4 requires Windows XP SP2, Windows 2003 SP1, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or later. Contact your application vendor.
This version of the .NET Framework 4 is not supported on an IA-64 operating system. Contact your application vendor.
A failure occurred attempting to install the .NET Framework 4.
A User Account Control (UAC) prompt was either canceled by the user or timed out. To prevent UAC prompts during an installation, run setup again with administrator permissions.
